getDocument

protected Document getDocument()
                        throws ExecutionException
Returns the document specified using the default document parameters (PARAMETER_DOCUMENT_ID, PARAMETER_DOCUMENT_AREA, PARAMETER_DOCUMENT_LANGUAGE).
